name: 2024 8th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Applications
content: Paper Publication: ◆ICBEA 2024 papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. ◆International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221), which will be indexed by Embase, CNKI, ProQuest, etc. ◆Excellent papers will be recommended to be submitted for publication in the International Journal-Molecular & Cellular Biomechanics (MCB, ISSN: 1556-5300) as a special issue paper, indexed by Scopus, Ei Compendex, BIOSIS Preview-Web of Science, INSPEC (IET), etc
